name: HumanPapillomavirusHPVVaccineAllergyIntolerance
title: Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine Allergy Intolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes and RxNORM codes that could be returned by the FHIR Allergy Intolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:HPV),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNORM codes for individual medications that are Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccines, and various SNOMED CT codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccines as a class, or individual Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
